details: Both agent/models.py (Pydantic) and agent/db_models.py (SQLModel) are used. Consider unifying them to reduce redundancy and conversion overhead.

task: Align Frontend Service with Backend API
details: HubApiService.ts contains some methods (like streamSystemEvents) that might need server-side verification of SSE stability and auth token passing via query params (which is less secure than headers).
Add a global dark mode toggle in the settings and use CSS variables for theme consistency across all components.
Implement drag-and-drop functionality in BoardComponent (e.g., using @angular/cdk/drag-drop) to move tasks between columns easily.
Add a search bar and status/priority filters to the Board and Agents list to improve navigability with many items.
The AI assistant should support Markdown rendering for code snippets and better visual feedback during streaming responses.
Replace or augment the current NotificationService with a more modern Toast-Notification system that supports auto-dismiss and different levels (Success, Error, Info).
Add visual loading indicators (spinners or skeleton screens) for slow API calls, especially in TaskDetail and AgentsList.
Enhance the Dashboard with real-time charts (e.g., using Chart.js or ngx-charts) for system metrics and task progress history.
Improve the mobile view of the application, specifically the Board and TaskDetail layouts which currently rely heavily on fixed grid columns.
The backend now supports MFA backup codes, but the frontend needs to display them after setup and allow entering them in the login form.
Auth token for SSE is currently passed via query params in some places. Consider more secure alternatives or ensure short-lived tokens.
